function.name: todo.add
function.description: Adds a new task or item to the user's to-do list.

item.description: The content of the task to add.

function.name: todo.view
function.description: Displays all the items currently in the to-do list with their corresponding numbers.

function.name: todo.complete
function.description: Marks an item as complete and removes it from the to-do list using its number.

item_number.description: The number of the item to remove, as shown by 'todo.view'.
